backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing contact inquiries, allowing submission with validation and retrieval sorted by timestamp or by ID.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report listing implemented features, associated source files, components, and confidence indicators for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend components, pages, hooks, utilities, and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes, applying base layout styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that loads the React application through main.tsx and provides the root mounting element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with routes for Home, Tools, Contact, and About, wrapped in the SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, contact info, and attribution including a dynamic caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive header with logo, desktop and mobile navigation menus, and active-route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout component combining the header, routed page content outlet, and footer into a full-page structure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and refreshes the backend actor based on Internet Identity state and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options and exposes status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to submit contact inquiries and fetch all inquiries using the backend actor. Automatically invalidates inquiry data after mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes. Applies global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Exports a helper that copies text to the clipboard and returns whether it succeeded. Logs errors on failure.
frontend/src/lib/contactValidation.ts: Validates contact form fields for required values, email format, and message length. Returns an errors object keyed by field name.
frontend/src/lib/fitnessCalculators.ts: Implements BMI, BMI category, and TDEE calculations using metric/imperial conversions and activity multipliers. Supports male and female metabolic formulas.
frontend/src/lib/useDocumentTitle.ts: A small hook that updates the document title whenever the provided title changes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers. Loads global styles and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with mission and core values sections, using themed UI components and setting the document title.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Displays a contact form with validation, inquiry submission, and success/error states. Uses React Query to send inquiries to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Implements the home page with a hero banner and feature highlights, including navigation links and themed visual sections.
frontend/src/pages/Tools.tsx: Implements the Tools page with BMI and calorie calculators plus a weekly workout planner with copy-to-clipboard export.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, requirements, existing features, and image needs for the fitness coach website.
